meanings.definition: The concept or belief in a life after death.
meanings.sent1: Many people find comfort in the idea of afterlifes.
meanings.sent2: The afterlifes of different cultures vary widely.
meanings.sent3: Discussing afterlifes can lead to deep conversations.
meanings.sent4: In literature, afterlifes are often portrayed as mysterious realms.
meanings.sent5: The afterlifes in myths are fascinating to explore.

meanings.definition: The existence or realm of the dead after death.
meanings.sent2: Exploring the afterlifes in folklore can be eerie.
meanings.sent3: Ghosts wandering in afterlifes make for spooky stories.
meanings.sent4: The afterlifes in horror movies are full of suspense.
meanings.sent5: The afterlifes in legends are shrouded in mystery.
